sys_metadata_link.payload:
6549e4502ff7d850e0f497eef699b695 30 The habitat of many sentinels is more than just where they live.  It is their primary focus, and defending it dominates their thoughts.  They study its streets and buildings, learning the best ways and times to travel through it.  They also learn the hidden secrets of those who live there, whether law-abiding citizens or crime lords using veneers of respectability to avoid the rightful punishment.  For those Sentinels, such knowledge and expertise is more than just useful information - it can become the decider between life and death.

BASE ABILITY

Once per game session when in a chosen urban setting, the character may spend 2 destiny points and make a Hard (3 difficulty dice) Knowledge (Core Worlds) or Knowledge (Outer Rim) check (depending on the location).  If successful, for the remainder of the game session, the character may suffer 2 strain to recall or learn the location of any individual, group, or establishment within that city, along with any relevant information such as reputation, rumored or open ties to the Empire or Rebellion, or criminal nature (if any).

]]> My City SIG0001016 ben.fisher 2022-04-29 16:31:27 7611dbd72f8b0910e0f497eef699b6bb 0 ben.fisher 2022-04-29 16:31:27 {"artisan":"cf099fb32f9ce090e0f497eef699b66b,4dcfd7bb2f9ce090e0f497eef699b6e6","sentry":"11e3b8a42f07cd10e0f497eef699b6e1,de0438a42f07cd10e0f497eef699b6f7","shadow":"6cca6f772fdce090e0f497eef699b6f0,62da2f772fdce090e0f497eef699b6c9","shien expert":"8f8c633b2fdce090e0f497eef699b649,217c6bf72fdce090e0f497eef699b64b"}
